Class JsonLdValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.validators.JsonLdValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator

    @Component
public class JsonLdValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Validator
    Implements a input validator for JSON-LD that validates against the WADM schema
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

      • validateContainer

        public boolean validateContainer(java.lang.String containerString)
        Description copied from interface: Validator
        Validates a given ContainerString in the given format against the Web Annotation Data Model - Schema. It has to be a valid AnnotationCollection.
        Specified by:
        validateContainer in interface Validator
        Parameters:
        containerString - The container as a String
        Returns:
        True if a valid AnnotationCollection, false otherwise
